User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://tobagin.github.io/sitemap.xml

# Allow indexing of all pages
Allow: /apps/
Allow: /assets/

# Disallow any admin or build artifacts (if any exist)
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /_test/

# Cache policy - crawl delay to be respectful
Crawl-delay: 1
